mapper.select: SELECT a.id,a.visits,a.title,a.is_original,a.source_url,a.description,a.is_comment,a.content,a.create_time,a.update_time,a.url,a.status,a.type,b.name AS category_name,b.url AS category_url FROM blog_article a LEFT JOIN blog_category b ON a.category_id=b.id WHERE a.url=#{url} AND a.status = 1

SELECT a.id,a.title,a.description,a.is_top,a.image,a.create_time,a.url,b.name AS category_name,b.url AS category_url FROM blog_article a LEFT JOIN blog_category b ON a.category_id=b.id WHERE a.is_top=TRUE AND a.status=1 and a.type = 0 AND a.is_delete = 0

SELECT a.id,a.title,a.description,a.is_top,a.image,a.create_time,a.url,b.name AS category_name,b.url AS category_url FROM blog_article a LEFT JOIN blog_category b ON a.category_id=b.id WHERE a.status=1 and a.type = 0 and a.is_delete = 0
AND a.is_top=FALSE
AND (a.title like #{keyword} OR a.description like #{keyword} OR a.content_md like #{keyword})

SELECT a.id,a.title,a.description,a.image,a.is_top,a.create_time,a.url,b.name AS category_name,b.url AS category_url FROM blog_article a LEFT JOIN blog_category b ON a.category_id=b.id LEFT JOIN blog_article_tag c ON a.id=c.article_id WHERE a.status=1 and a.type=0 AND c.tag_id=#{tagId}

SELECT a.id,a.title,a.description,a.image,a.is_top,a.create_time,a.url,b.name AS category_name,b.url AS category_url FROM blog_article a LEFT JOIN blog_category b ON a.category_id=b.id WHERE a.status=1 and a.type=0 AND a.category_id=#{categoryId}
